Title: Sasha's POV
Plot:
Riggs won't stop hitting on Sasha, and she's finding it harder and harder to avoid giving intp temptation. 
She gets mad at every move he makes, but at the same time is confused about her relationship with Rob. 

Meanwhile, she's trying to make things up with Nicki and gives her the 12 red roses Riggs gave her. 
When Nicki finds out about the source of the roses she's mad, but her father convinces her to forgive Sasha.
